name: hellosepi Panda t-shirt.
description:
A unique hand-drawn illustration by a young artist (Sepideh Zolfaghari) which has then been screen-printed. Unisex t-shirt.

Sizes available:

Size:

Chest (to fit in inches):

S - 35/37", M - 38/40" , L - 41/43" & XL - 44/46"

Converted into centimetres (cm):

S - 89/94 , M - 96.5/101.5 , L - 104/109 & XL - 111/116

For more insight into my work and what I am currently studying please feel free to check out my online portfolio which I frequently upload with projects.

http://www.behance.net/hellosepi

Feel free to follow me on twitter too:

https://twitter.com/hellosepi
